Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.Container

Class CountryContainer

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.Container.CountryContainer
public class CountryContainer extends Object
This class is responsible for searching country in different way like by it's name, id and neighbour

  • Method Details

    • findByCountryName

      public List<Country> findByCountryName(String p_countryName)
      Retrieves a list of countries that exactly match the specified country name. It's recommended to format the input name properly to ensure accurate matching.
      Parameters:
      countryName - The name of the country to search for. This parameter should not be null.
      Returns:
      A List containing the matched countries. The list is empty if no countries match the provided name.

    • findFirstByCountryName

      public Country findFirstByCountryName(String p_countryName) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Retrieves the first country that matches the specified country name
      Parameters:
      countryName - The name of the country to search for. This parameter should not be null.
      Returns:
      The first Country object that matches the given country name.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If no country with the given name is found.

    • findByCountryId

      public Country findByCountryId(Integer p_countryId)
      Finds and returns a country by its unique ID. This method searches for a country with the specified ID. If a country with the given ID is found, it is returned. Otherwise, this method returns null, indicating that no country with the specified ID could be found.
      Parameters:
      countryId - The unique identifier of the country to search for. This parameter should not be null.
      Returns:
      The Country object with the specified ID, or null if no such country is found.

    • findByNeighbourOfCountries

      public List<Country> findByNeighbourOfCountries(Country p_country)
      Finds all countries that are neighbors of the specified country. This method searches through the list of available countries, identifying those that have the specified country as a neighbor. The specified country itself is not included in the results. This method assumes that the relationship of being neighbors is mutual; that is, if country A is a neighbor of country B, then country B is also considered a neighbor of country A.
      Parameters:
      country - The country for which to find neighbors. This parameter should not be null.
      Returns:
      A List of countries that are neighbors of the specified country. The list is empty if the country has no neighbors or if the specified country is not found.

    • findCountryNeighborsAndNotOwned

      public List<Country> findCountryNeighborsAndNotOwned(Country p_country) throws IllegalStateException
      Retrieves a list of neighboring countries of the specified country that are not owned by any entity. This method filters through the neighboring countries of the provided country and selects those which are currently not owned (i.e., their 'ownedBy' attribute is null). It is useful for identifying potential countries for expansion or diplomatic relations that are not currently under the control of another entity.
      Parameters:
      country - The country whose neighbors are to be evaluated. This parameter should not be null.
      Returns:
      A List of Country objects representing the neighboring countries that are not owned.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the provided country is null, indicating an inappropriate use of the method.
